sub_title: Lead Cloud Architect, MVP - Microsoft Azure
summary:
Malin is a Lead Cloud Architect with hands-on engineering experience assisting organizations to migrate from legacy systems to modern cloud-centric solutionsâ€”also a public speaker at many technology conferences and meet-ups. Malin is a Microsoft Most Valuable Professional for Microsoft Azure (2019-2023) and was for Office Servers and Services (2016-2018).

Malin has a solid academic background with an MBA and a BSc. in IT with research, where he focused on recommender systems during his final thesis. Malin has had several achievements since university, including recognition as the Winner of the Microsoft Imagine Cup 2012 - Sri Lanka and the World Citizenship Category in Microsoft Imagine Cup 2013 - Sri Lanka.
